sub_topic: Probability of a certain type of environmental event occurring in a region
message_1: On an average, a certain city has 10 days of heavy rain per year. If the probability of heavy rain on any given day is 0.0274, what is the population of the city?
message_2: The information provided is not sufficient to determine the population of the city. The average number of heavy rain days and the probability of heavy rain on any given day are not related to the population size. Please provide more information or a different question related to the given data.
